entry.title: Cartographer
entry.summary: From the given context, it can be inferred that Peter's message tone was deemed inappropriate by an outside observer in regards to a specific discussion. The observer found his sardonic tone unsuitable for furthering the conversation. However, no information is provided regarding the nature or topic of the discussion.It is worth noting that the above statement does not provide any additional background or details on who Peter is, the identity of the outside observer, or the medium of communication used for the discussion. Therefore, it can be assumed that these details are either not relevant or were previously mentioned in a separate conversation or document.In conclusion, based on the given context, it can be deduced that an outside observer found Peter's sardonic message tone unsuitable for advancing a particular discussion. However, without further information, it is difficult to determine the full extent and impact of this situation.
